c53018b605c5.title: Okay,let’s grant that all the claims about minority groups not having ID are true.

paragraphs.text: Okay,let’s grant that all the claims about minority groups not having ID are true. How long has it been since the push for voter ID started? Twenty years maybe? So how is it that the Democrats — who spent a billion dollars just on Hillary’s campaign — can’t peel off a little money for a program to help their constituents get down to the DMV to get ID cards?
